tasks.title: Fix Vite build failure in workspace-proteus junction
tasks.description: Vite production build fails with 'The fileName or name properties of emitted chunks and assets must be strings that are neither absolute nor relative paths'. This occurs because the workspace-proteus directory is a Windows junction, and Vite resolves the real path through the junction creating a relative path traversal (../../../../workspace/nodalync-protocol/apps/desktop/index.html). The 603 modules compile fine — it's only the output file emission that breaks. May need vite.config adjustment to handle junction/symlink resolution.
tasks.resolution: Added resolve.preserveSymlinks: true to vite.config.js. Build verified: 604 modules, clean output.

tasks.title: Extract shared constants + Tauri event hooks
tasks.description: Extracted duplicated TYPE_COLORS/PREDICATE_LABELS/GRAPH_CONFIG to lib/constants.js. Created useTauriEvents hook for clean backend event subscriptions. Wired graph:updated and l2:complete events for auto-refresh. Removed ~125 lines of duplication across 3 components.
